steps.text:
Case records of the Massachusetts General Hospital. Case 40-2011. A 52-year-old 
man with weakness, infections, and enlarged adrenal glands.
Tritos NA(1), Schaefer PW, Stein TD.

Author information:
(1)Neuroendocrine Unit, the Department of Medicine, Massachusetts General 
Hospital, and Harvard Medical School, Boston, USA.
